org.stringtemplate.v4

Class NumberRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stringtemplate.v4.NumberRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeRenderer

    public class NumberRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttributeRenderer
    Works with Byte, Short, Integer, Long, and BigInteger as well as Float, Double, and BigDecimal. You pass in a format string suitable for Formatter.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...).

    For example, %10d emits a number as a decimal int padding to 10 char. This can even do long to Date conversions using the format string.
